title: Program for Developing Self-Assessment Tools for Mathematical Classroom Learning Behaviors

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Re-education Program for Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields. Analysis of Language-Integrated Mathematics Learning Behaviors and Customized Instructional Design Support in BYOD Environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately diagnose their learning behaviors during math lessons using a three-stage self-assessment tool.
Learners can develop personalized learning strategy improvement plans based on assessment results.
Learners can create effective math learning environments through peer feedback and expert guidance.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
